name: strava-kudos-lambda
description: Give Strava Kudos to Recent Activity in a given club page

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && rm -f ../package.zip && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-nochrome: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && rm -f ../package.zip && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: npm run lint && npm run babel && cp -r package.json dist && cd dist && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.local: npm run babel && cp -r node_modules dist && node dist/pupp/local.js
